About Us 0 Skip to Content Caf√© & Wine Bar Dog Grooming Dog Day Care Pet Shop Events About Contact Open Menu Close Menu Caf√© & Wine Bar Dog Grooming Dog Day Care Pet Shop Events About Contact Open Menu Close Menu Caf√© & Wine Bar Dog Grooming Dog Day Care Pet Shop Events About Contact Our story Snuffle Dog Caf√© started with Silvia Fois's dream to create a haven for dog lovers and their humans. Dogs aren't just pets - they're family. And family belongs everywhere, from morning coffee runs to happy hour hangouts. That‚Äôs why we created a safe and welcoming space at Snuffle where dog lovers and their canine companions can come together to enjoy good food, great drinks, and community. A haven for dogs and their human friends We love running events, and we're lucky to be part of such a friendly, dog-loving community. From BBQs in our garden to dog shows in the park, we're always trying to engage with our neighbourhood friends. More events at Snuffle Join our community of dog lovers Sign up with your email address and we‚Äôll keep you updated with updates about all our events. Email Address Sign Up Thanks for subscribing. We‚Äôll be in touch soon with news and updates! We‚Äôre not just a business - we‚Äôre a family of dog lovers. And you‚Äôre not just customers - you‚Äôre our fellow dog-obsessed pals. So whether you pop in for a puppuccino, or bring your pup to play, we‚Äôre here to celebrate our mutual affection for our furry friends. Contact us Contact us Contact us Name * First Name Last Name Email * Message * Thanks for your message. We'll take a look and get back to you soon! Vichino's Coffee - Bakery Coffee - Bakery Coffee - Bakery Coffee - Bakery Musical shows Musical shows Musical shows Musical shows sunset wine tasting cruise sunset wine tasting cruise sunset wine tasting cruise sunset wine tasting cruise Wine Tasting Wine Tasting Wine Tasting Wine Tasting Magic with alex Geiser Magic with alex Geiser Magic with alex Geiser Magic with alex Geiser Home Products Contact Us Events Eventbrite Page Gift Cards More Home Products Contact Us Events Eventbrite Page Gift Cards Home Products Contact Us Events Eventbrite Page Gift Cards Are You Ready To Taste The Difference? We have carefully selected our own coffee & espresso blends for you to enjoy. Our beans are roasted locally, and delivered weekly. This ensures you are always drinking the FRESHEST & most SMOOTH coffee you've ever tasted. Did you know?? Popular chain coffee beans are roasted MONTHS before they make it to your cup. At Vichino's, the bean will never be more than 5 DAYS after roast. You WILL taste the difference. As Seen on Local TV! Hey, look! It's us! Vichino's Owners, Kevin & Shannen, were featured on ABC to talk about the caf√© and all the good things happening at our family-owned coffee shop, bakery, & wine bar! As Seen on Local TV! Vichino's Cafe & Wine Bar  Feb 27, 2022 Vichino's show their products live on ABC news in the kitchen segment Vichino's Cafe & Wine Bar May 1st, 2022 Vichino's showing there bakery goods, and new wine mix drinks Reviews Follow Us! About Us - Vinny's | Chicago, IL 130 North Canal Street Chicago, IL 60661 130 North Canal Street Chicago, IL 60661 Home Delivery/ Carryout About Us Menu Food Menu Beverage Menu Gallery Party & Events Testimonials Contact More Home Delivery/ Carryout About Us Menu Food Menu Beverage Menu Gallery Party & Events Testimonials Contact Location 130 North Canal Street Chicago, IL 60661 312-902-1544 Reserve Now about us The focal point of Vinny's Pizza Bar's menu is their specialty pizza that is made from scratch daily. Their signature, house-made dough uses a hands-on approach resulting in a crust that is the perfect combination of crispy and fresh baked. The 14" pizzas include signature toppings such as The Frunchroom topped with Catalpa Farm‚Äôs sausage, roasted peppers, mushrooms, mozzarella and marinara. A true southside classic! Dwayne ‚ÄúThe Broc‚Äù Johnson features roasted broccoli, Catalpa Farm‚Äôs sausage, artichoke hearts, mozzarella, cherry pepper aioli and marinara. Additional Menu items include house-made Garlic Bread (that is made from their flavorful, signature pizza dough) soup and salads (featuring their delicious local Chop Salad), Sharables (house-made Meatballs, organic amish Chicken Wings) and Sandwiches (Roasted Pork Sandwich featuring Catalpa Farm‚Äôs Pork, Burger featuring Perkins Farm‚Äôs angus beef) The well-rounded drink menu offers a selection of draft beers, red and white wine and inventive signature cocktails, such as Vinny‚Äôs Drink featuring Jack Daniels Rye, amaro and an orange peel served over a large ice cube. During the week, Vinny's offers Happy Hour specials Monday through Friday from 3 to 6 p.m. Guests can sip on Local Craft Draft, Glass of Wine and a Beer & Garlic Bread combo for a discounted price. Vinny's ¬© 2025 A Mopro Website Back to Top
